extendedInfo.description: Are you planning to go on holiday in Italy or you are already in Italy?.Who knows how many times you will ever have the need to find innear a pharmacy, even at night or during weekendsweek.FarmaCity Well, then, is the application for you!FarmaCity thanks to the integrated localizer your droid, will look forpharmacies in the vicinity, indicating those open and even closed ones. Egoogle map integrated with the navigator is able to take us straightselected at the pharmacy.The status information of pharmacies and the maps are updated(when necessary) through the mobile network or WiFi.FarmaCity is able to monitor more than 17,000 pharmacies in the territoryItalian
